title: terms_75.txt
terms:
Okay, here’s the text cleaning output, focused solely on the Terms and Conditions section.

**Terms and Conditions**

General Terms and Conditions - Qualtrics

Skip to main content

GTC

Regardless of which Qualtrics Cloud Services, professional services or research services you purchase, there is one set of foundational terms for them all – the General Terms and Conditions, which we call the GTCs.

This means you don’t have to spend time reviewing different terms every time you make a new purchase. The GTCs will apply to all of your contracts with Qualtrics.

TermScout

We are not the only ones who think our terms are fair to our customers. Our GTCs have been reviewed and certified as ‘Customer Favorable’ by TermScout, an independent contract rating company.

English General Terms and Conditions

If a valid agreement exists between you (“Customer”) and Qualtrics, LLC (“Qualtrics”) related to the subject matter hereof, those terms take precedence over these terms unless otherwise agreed by the Parties in relation to a specific Order Form.

Modifications to this Agreement. Qualtrics may modify these GTC at any time by posting a revised version on this website (https://www.qualtrics.com/legal/customers/gtcs/) or otherwise providing notice to Customer. By continuing to use the services after the effective date of any modifications to these GTC, Customer agrees to be bound by the modified terms. Some services may be subject to additional terms specific to those services as set forth in the Product Terms (https://www.qualtrics.com/legal/customers/product-terms/) , which are incorporated herein to the extent applicable.

United States Federal Government Agency:

If you are a United States federal government agency, use of the Services is subject to 
this amendment

Australian Small Businesses:

If your contract with Qualtrics is a Small Business Contract for the purposes of the Treasury Laws Amendment (More Competition, Better Prices) Act 2022 (Cth), use of the services is subject to 
this amendment

Online Payments:

If you have purchased your services online, the purchase of those services is subject to 
this amendment
